data.title: Privilege Ibiza | Biggest nightclub of the world
data.meta_description: Experience the futuristic clubbing in Privilege Ibiza, biggest nightclub of world, with the total capacity to occupy 10,000 clubbers in a night.
data.text:
Ibiza is the #1 spot for party animals to have fun and unwind. It’s been adjourned with the best nightlife ever worldwide! That gives enough reason to visit this absolutely awesome place. Privilege in San Rafael has attained great reputation from revelers for its huge space that can actually have room for over 10,000 clubbers! That’s right, the place can accommodate a massive number of guests and still have room enough for people to dance and make merry!

If you ever visit this electrifying spot, do not miss out all the action live at this club. There are taxis available in plenty on the outside and that makes transportation so easy. Not just that there is no pushing or shoving even with so many people trying to get inside. This is one fact that makes this place so much distinct from the rest of the regions.

The place is huge and perhaps has the biggest interior ever. In fact, the security is also well-mannered and so is the staff. The feel good impact of this nightclub ensures that more revelers throng to this destination every night to relish the amazing atmosphere. For anyone looking to avail an unforgettable night of fun and thrill look out for the fantastic provisions offered by Privilege. The place opens midnight and the action goes on through the night till 07:00 AM morning.

There is a Vista Room that has glass walls providing a glimpse of the exotic scenic view of the picturesque Ibiza. Drinks are expensive, but Ibiza is the heartland of nightlife and you just cannot expect it to be anywhere affordable! The place is buzzing with live electrifying EDM and can be stated to be the best stop for those looking to grab a slice of the excitement. Music is smashing and you just need to keep jiving to those fantastic beats – gyrate and watch the lovely dancers captivate your senses!

Guys must be well-dressed to enter the spot. No shorts and shabby wear! There are pretty girls that visit this location and it’s best to be your uber cool to grab their attention! The brilliant show, bike stuntmen, cover artists, gorgeous models and live acrobatic acts will get you hooked to the nightclub as more visitors keep coming back to get such a thrilling experience.

The staff ensures that revelers get every bit of the exclusive service that can be availed. People get served in order which is really great. So, you don’t really have to wait long to see your order coming through. The best part is that the food is delicious. Visit the place and throughout the year you’ll be able to enjoy a myriad of events and activities! Pure sunk trance shows, SuperMartxe, ASOT, neon night party, and various artists keep performing at different times of the year.

The privilege wrist band for VIP guests is an added facility. A swimming pool in the area enables party animals to get a dip into the pool especially during the summers when temperatures soar high. But, the heat and action is literally up all through the week nights and weekends with loads of great artists performing ‘live shows’ that is fun and exciting. The good music, fun people, and attractive interiors keep revelers in very good mood.

It isn’t a normal nightclub with so much action going on. Entry prices are a bit expensive, but worth the money. It’s insane to get bored in Privilege with so much activity going around. The atmosphere is epic and it’s just how Ibiza lets you party all night long!

Address: Privilege nightclub, Urbanizacion San Rafael, San Rafael, Ibiza, Balearic Islands, Island, Spain.

Directions: located on the Ibiza Town- San Antonio Road. When coming from Ibiza, see the on the right side of the road. From Ibiza Town it’s about 4 KM, from San Antonio its 7 km and from Playa dénBossa area it’s about 10 KM far away.

Busses running from 12:00AM until 06:00AM. Clubbers can also take the Disco Bus, which connects all tourist spots and clubs on the Ibiza Island.
